column1: * BEIS replaced the Department for Business, Innovation and Skills (BIS) and the Department of Energy and Climate Change (DECC) in July 2016. The department continued to report former BIS and DECC data separately until March 2017 as staff who moved departments due to the machinery of government changes were still on the payroll.

** Responsibility for CITB, ECITB, HEFCE, OFFA, SFA, SLC & UKCES passed to DfE in July 2016 as part of the machinery of government changes. The department continued to report on these partner organisations until they were officially handed over.
Higher Education Funding Council for England (HEFCE) no longer applicable.
Student Loans Company Ltd (SLC) no longer applicable.
